message.body: 3 raiders from TheBiob have joined!
good evening
gl very easy 3 screens (that won't take long)
welcome back to the 3 screen sandbox.
you can do anything, it just doesn't give you 2 exits.
3 screen sandbox LOL
considering how much magikey talked about changing gamemodes i'm honestly surprised that this would be the first in the series to require it
I mean some OW routes look more intended than others, but they don't seem to work better than others.
yeah i just mean like, i already expected it in two screens so i'm not surprised if it's actually intended here
also considering you can play the title i wouldn't be surprised if you're supposed to skip the file select alltogether
whatever that may do for you
LM changelog: added no OW-patch, removed the OW editor.
what the hell was that
the level/event display
beautiful
understanable
and we don't drink
Noise is the expert on alcohol.
lol
without layer 2?
huh
straight ouf the abyss playbook.
did you say you pressed 8 on the overworld
it's a keyhole, not an orb, so not stealing.
@TheBiob yes I tried pressing 8 too, didn't work on my end either.
i can't actually find what that's supposed to be nor does it seem to do anything in my LM
oh wait
it's only in layer 1 event mode that it does something
ok no in either event mode
but not in the normal mode
Yooo @xhf01x FutureMan DinoDance
weird
as far as i can tell it just turns off layer 2 though so idk what it's actually doing for it to display something else on your end
I have to optimize level load for a level you can't re-enter
It's called "not making the player wait". You wouldn't know because kruela 2 koopa kid
think of all the rom space that was saved!
actually i wonder how much rom space was actually saved with that
no but it might not be 1 map16 page per allocation
i'm not sure though
but still, i'm not sure what the ratio would be
what was the koopa kid
and a snow auto scroller.
not if you're bringing 10 spring boards.
Snow autoscroller is one of two levels where I actually kinda needed help
Good level tho
How do you open screen exits like that btw
oh do you like, wait for it to loop or something
I need to learn these mouse gestures
it is a very good feature
hi HF o/ gl puzzling
Wtf
huh
Why would you ever need this
i mean i guess for straight path tiles it could be useful
Why don't in-level map16 tiles work like this? Kapp
sariel mode
o/ biob, dacin, magikey
also, "This option can turn the display of static layer 2 tiles (ie. non-event path tiles) on or off. This will have no effect in anything other than one of the Event Editor modes."

good evening Bux.
i'm not sure what the implies for this hack
o/ bux
welcome to tomato garden, the level with all the tomato surprises.

oh hi mag

magusShake
This level

lol
@Magikey47 and I was so sure that was an intended tomato surprise.
I mean you can steal that idea
I already stole 2 things from the one screen puzzles, no need for a third.
level design 101: randomize map16ness each update
asm nobody needs: blocks that sometimes use item memory, and sometimes just don't.
not if you scale down multi selected map16
then it's more than 1 byte
Done
did tacking on conditional map16 also bump it up
i forget
lmao
hell yeah
powerful object
this is an overworld!
hey hf
LUL
no level set in lm, I imagine you can use asm
hahaha
You can yell at me here
spawn a reznor in his kitchen and watch the floor disappear.
something something if the brown platform is in slot #5
touch the 4th muncher in the level on the right side to activate event 10
No custom asm but there is a custom sprite that uses rng but I'm not gonna tell you how it works
LUL
thabDance
D:
No it hasn't
Why does lm export it
maybe re-saved?
I have no idea
good filter
i wish it worked
magikey made the speedrun midair required
can you even grab the baby yoshi
I like how the custom music keeps going
hooray gameplay
I had a reference in two sceen i had to have another here
those death block tunnels are very recognizable
they really do
what's keeping you in the title screen anyway?
that's certainly something
you say that but
i guess that means skipping the title screen would actually allow you to continue
now the real question is what does that do to the events
i don't think i've ever seen that display option huh
and the submap warp?
that works by opening the display level message 1 sprite right?
which resets 0109 to allow you to leave the intro? i think?
idk, something must
or actually, i guess any message might
because message boxes do too
It's what allows you to leave the intro level is it not
Because intro level also resets when you beat it
Or die
yeah, which works by the same mechanism of 0109
well something must
the message box code itself?
maybe check when it actually gets cleared
like, in-game
regex enabled?
nvm
Can't you just search STZ $0109
Oh stream is late for me
the previous one looked right
right so yeah, probably just dismissing any message box that does it
you also go to gamemode B?
that is what i pointed out earlier, yes
doesn't it just show the tab alone
or is the filename the problem
fair
lol
but actually there is another point to what you're saying but if you submap warp in the intro you don't land at 0,0 of the main overworld right?
either message box or maybe yoshi message?
right
ah
"Conditions are: in Yoshi's Island, first time, and not title screen."
so actually yoshi message doesn't work anyway because it checks 0109
Oh ig because mario does hatch a yoshi in the title screen
how far away from sprite tables is 1426
does indeed not look too good for sprite tables
or any tables between 1326 and 1426
9E isn't something we can easily write to either right?
figured
9E would be pretty powerful, i feel like that'd be explored a lot
yeah
it updates the databank?
getdrawinfo does actually assume bank 02 is set as databank
You need to set that one timer with the blue koopa
That wasn't the title screen
You were in level 6
huh, i wonder what's actually different here
i guess not having died?
i just meant because the overworld loaded properly that time
when you just poked it it was very much not right
You are in yoshi's island
i think lm changes that
Aura
the sprite 19 fix says "it will reset Mario's overworld map number back to the one he started on"
Well the submap number is what you see not where you are
gl :3
Yeah that's what i mean
Mario himself is on yoshi's island
the movement code probably doesn't even know that, it just knows whatever is in 7FD800
oh yeah probably
it is indeed but at least i got the D800 right
Aren't all the submaps loaded at once while you're on one of them?
wait no i think the tiles might actually be C800
nvm
i don't think it loads both of them at the same time
hm no you might actually be right
it's 1024 that's needed
2048 that's allocated
well, i don't know whether or not both are loaded but either way you're right that the movement code does apparently care about it
7EC800 also just, says that lol
"Index to this table: %---- -SYX yyyy xxxx * If the player is on a submap ($1F11/$1F12 != 0), the S bit is set."
lol
looks like it
in which sense

well the data from the save isn't loaded for one
or initialized
Isn't most WRAM cleared on title screen load
well by initialized i don't mean cleared
all except for the stack and some unused areas in RAM

you win having flags like "don't reenter" not set
(presumably)

There is a ghost house
ghost houses always trigger save prompts yeah
good question :)
Fortress, Castle, Ghost House, Sunken Ghost Ship, every second Special World level, 2 switches
all switch palaces do
Why do switches have that? You're not supposed to beat them more than once
Smw moment
you weren't originally meant to beat castles more than once Kappa
The tiles that give you a save on first clear and reclear are the same, even if they're 2 differrent tables
Yeah but switches are gone from the game once you press them
So you can't rebeat them unless you bring an orb
Clearly the devs thought of that
that one overflow trick that lets you beat a switch palace and reenter it
The big switch would still be gone no?
yeah but it's funny
True
why does it even disappear though
Unrevealed vs revealed
You can even edit the reveal tile numbers in LM

in 19
